attributes.action: Introduce legislation oblidging cat owners to comply with the same legislation as that for dogs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would see cat owners held responsible in the same manner as dog owners are if thier animal fouls,causes an accident or attacks other pets or wildlife.

rejection.details: Thanks but this petition overlaps with another open petition http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Cat-Poo/ If you still wish to open this petition, please re-submit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
